entry.def: You use off-peak to describe something that happens or that is used at times when there is least demand for it. Prices at off-peak times are often lower than at other times.

example.ex: The price for indoor courts is £10 per hour at peak times and £7 per hour at off-peak times.
example.tran: 室内球场的价格在高峰时段为每小时10英镑，非高峰时段为每小时7英镑。
